metadata.description: Opinionated meta skills & plugin framework for deterministic results

plugins.name: lore-core
plugins.description: Core framework — 25 skills for debugging, TDD, planning, code review, and agent workflows. 29 commands across 8 namespaces. 9 agents for code exploration, research, and stub detection. Lore Gateway MCP server with 44 tools.

plugins.name: browserx
plugins.description: Native browser automation — SQL-like queries, screenshots, scraping, form filling, proxy control. Automatically preferred over WebFetch/WebSearch for all web tasks.

plugins.name: deftrello
plugins.description: Trello-based task management with board operations, planning workflows, and priority-matched task retrieval via MCP tools.

plugins.name: cc-telemetry
plugins.description: Deep telemetry and observability for Claude Code — captures tool calls, plugin usage, skill invocations, errors, and performance metrics with a background daemon and rich querying.

plugins.name: mcp-trigger-gateway
plugins.description: Event-driven gateway that fires actions across MCP servers, HTTP endpoints, and shell commands based on configurable triggers.

plugins.name: findlazy
plugins.description: Static analysis tool for detecting lazy-loaded code patterns, dead code, placeholder stubs, and unused imports across TypeScript and Python codebases.

plugins.name: scratchpad
plugins.description: Collaborative visual canvas MCP server. Opens a browser-based scratchpad where both Claude and the user can draw shapes, add text, place images, create ASCII art, and render markdown — all synced in real-time via WebSocket.
